title: The amorous prince, or, The curious husband a comedy / by Mrs. A. Behn.
author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.
publisher: Printed by J.M. for Thomas Dring,
notes: "Built on the novel of the Curious impertinent, and on Davenport's City night-cap."--Baker, Biog. Dram. cf. also Works of A. Behn, ed. by M. Summers, v. 4.
